project.title: Budget Tracker
project.about: A budget tracking application that allows a user to save transactions while offline, made with Node, Express, and NoSQL.

project.title: Fitness Tracker
project.about: A fitness tracking application made with Node, Express, MongoDB and mongoose

project.title: Employee Tracker
project.about: A command line CMS application to manage employees using Node, MySQL and Inquirer.

project.title: Burger
project.about: A burger logging application made with JS, MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars and a homemade ORM

project.title: Note Taker
project.about: A frontend application that allows a user to create, save and delete notes; made with Node, FS, and Express

project.title: the Hungry App
project.about: Front end application that uses Spoonacular API and Random Joke API calls to allow user to search recipes by ingredients while getting a joke.
